The individual parts conceal a rail into which an anchor fitted with 4 ball bearing castors is inserted before closing. Különböző hajszerkezetekhez és textúrákhoz is használható. Kíméletes ápolást biztosít a vékonyszálú hajnak, de a vastag és göndör haj is hatékonyan kifésülhető vele. items.title: Basilur Carnival Christmas Fantasy 75 g
items.desc: Tea Basilur Carnival Christmas Fantasy 75 g:Have you fallen in love with drinking tea and enjoy it in the peace and quiet of your home? Then you will definitely be interested in Basilur tea. Black tea has been known to …
items.raw_desc: Tea Basilur Carnival Christmas Fantasy 75 g:Have you fallen in love with drinking tea and enjoy it in the peace and quiet of your home? Then you will definitely be interested in Basilur tea. Black tea has been known to mankind since the 16th century. It all starts with the harvesting of the leaves of the Chinese or Assamese tea tree. The next step is the so-called. wilting, which is the process by which water evaporates from the petals. Subsequently, they are scrolled. The final step is the oxidation process. The final taste, aroma and colour of the tea depend most on this part of the processing. Oxidation is stopped by rapid heating, e.g. pan-frying, steaming or baking. You can buy Basilur tea in a 75 g pack. Key features of Basilur Carnival Christmas Fantasy tea 75 g tin Make yourself comfortable with a cup of your favourite tea Black tea is characterized by a pleasantly earthy and invigorating taste 75 g pack
